ignoreCommand: echo 'Debug Info:'; echo "PR=$VERCEL_GIT_PULL_REQUEST"; echo "Target Branch=$VERCEL_GITHUB_PULL_REQUEST_TARGET_BRANCH"; echo "Source Branch=$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF"; if [ "$VERCEL_GIT_PULL_REQUEST" != "false" ] && [ "$VERCEL_GITHUB_PULL_REQUEST_TARGET_BRANCH" = "feat-next-migration" ]; then exit 1; elif [ "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_REF" = "feat-next-migration" ]; then exit 1; else exit 0; fi
